channel.title: "You need a members account"
channel.description: Alright, so I'm testing a bunch of clients. I've found one, and it works fine, but the others say I need a members account. What's the problem with it?

item.title: "You need a members account"
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Maybe the server your using requires a certain port therefore when the port doesn’t match with the one that’s given, the client gives you that message. Try going into your signlink and Looking for the port supported by your server by opening client.java (Most likely) searching junk = uid; or something close to that, and look around for a bunch of random numbers (Ex: 129193) Once you’ve found them change it to the one in your client. Compile, Ect.

Read full topic

item.title: "You need a members account"
item.dc:creator: @V1LL3 V1LL3
item.description:
@V1LL3 wrote:

Theyre Members servers search ( CTRL + F ) for member or change your character file in character folder.
Search for;
IsMember = 0
and change the 0 to 1. you should be member then,
if it dont work. use a non member client.

Read full topic
